# Azure Hybrid Architecture Test Document

## Introduction

This test document covers Azure hybrid architecture patterns for integration testing.

## Hybrid Connectivity

Azure hybrid connectivity options include:

- ExpressRoute for dedicated connections
- VPN Gateway for site-to-site connectivity
- Azure Arc for hybrid management

## VMware HCX Integration

VMware HCX enables:

- Seamless VM migration to Azure
- Network extension capabilities
- Bulk migration support
- Disaster recovery scenarios

## Active-Active Configuration

For high availability:

- Deploy across multiple Azure regions
- Use Traffic Manager for load balancing
- Implement geo-replication
- Configure automated failover

## Networking Requirements

- Configure ExpressRoute circuits
- Set up routing tables
- Implement network security groups
- Enable Azure Monitor for networking

## Management and Monitoring

- Use Azure Monitor for telemetry
- Implement Azure Log Analytics
- Set up Azure Sentinel for security
- Configure automated alerts

## Cost Optimization

- Use Azure Cost Management
- Implement resource tagging
- Right-size virtual machines
- Use Azure Reservations

## Conclusion

This test document provides Azure hybrid architecture guidance for testing purposes.
